thumb.title: [TAS] Flash Mocou's Kitchen by dekutony in 00:33.57
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8SQm97koTJg以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6536M TAS originally published on 2025-05-08Mocou's Kitchen, more better known as Mokou's Kitchen, is a Touhou fangame by a developer named yu-ki. This game has you follow along and assist Fujiwara no Mokou as she shows you how to prepare one of her signature Gensokyo dishes. However, it involves a bit of youkai wrangling, so things may get a little messy.In this run, dekutony ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/dekutony) beats the game in record time on the Lunatic difficulty and enjoys themselves to a dish that can't be shown on TV.Warning: The run contains scenes of implied cannibalism and graphic violence played as comedy.
thumb.last_res_body: ←暗黒物質（ダーク... こんなのをtasvide... まいんスイーパー... 大技林ｗ 大らかな時代の東... うるせぇ！ 料理名は何だ？
